definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Chemists discovered how to make synthetic rubber.
sentences.chinese: 化学家发现了制造合成橡胶的方法。

sentences.english: A top layer is coextensive with and secured to the first side of the synthetic rubber layer.
sentences.chinese: 顶层与合成橡胶层的第一侧同延并固定到该第一侧。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a synthetic rubber material injection machine and an injection device thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是有关于合成橡胶材料注射机及其注射装置。

sentences.english: PMS cau be used for making synthetic rubber last end of styrene.
sentences.chinese: PMS可以代替苯乙烯用于合成橡胶工业。

sentences.english: The advance of technology in functionalized organolithium initiators and their application in synthetic rubber was reviewed with 23 references.
sentences.chinese: 有机单锂引发剂的技术进展以及在合成橡胶中的应用。

sentences.english: Isoprene needs to be extremely pure to make synthetic rubber.
sentences.chinese: 而异戊二烯必须极其纯净才能生产出合成橡胶。

sentences.english: Synthetic rubber of equal quality still cannot be practicably manufactured.
sentences.chinese: 与天然橡胶同等质量的合成橡胶仍然不能实际生产。

sentences.english: Synthetic rubber is a copolymer of butadiene and styrene.
sentences.chinese: 合成橡胶是丁二烯和苯乙烯的共聚物。

sentences.english: It shall have a Butyl diaphragm separating the air chamber from the water containing chamber.
sentences.chinese: 应该采用丁基合成橡胶将气腔与水腔隔离开来。

sentences.english: Features synthetic rubber uppers for comfort.
sentences.chinese: 舒适性为特点的合成橡胶鞋面。

sentences.english: Disproportionated rosin is a modified form of "rosin, widely employed for the production of synthetic rubbers."
sentences.chinese: 歧化松香是一种广泛使用于合成橡胶生产的改性松香。

sentences.english: The preparation of synthetic rubber characterized by high green strength was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一种具有高生胶强度的合成橡胶的制备方法。

sentences.english: By 1964 synthetic rubber made up 75% of the market.
sentences.chinese: 到1964年的时候，合成橡胶占美国市场的75%。

sentences.english: We chose the material [neoprene] before knowing what the design was going to be.
sentences.chinese: 在我们决定设计之前，就选择了合成橡胶这种材料。

sentences.english: Seal cover over the heat exchanger airtight with butyl adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 用丁基合成橡胶粘合胶将罩盖密封在热交换器上。

sentences.english: All rubber elastomers shall be of chloramine resistant material.
sentences.chinese: 所有弹性合成橡胶应该是耐氯胺腐蚀材料。
